Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_01.Text:
*: ♪ Ohhh, here is a place where young couples do tarry...
Though some will not last, still yet others will marryyy! ♪

*: ♪ There once were two lovers who came almost daily...
Where now are those faces that smiled then so gaily? ♪

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_02.Text:
*: ♪ Oh, to look at the sea, one would hardly believe...
That with hideous monsters its currents do seethe... ♪
*: ♪ Yes, it sometimes doth seem like a fanciful dream... ♪

*: ♪ Is our world perhaps naught but a fantasist's scheeeme? ♪
Zounds! Forgive me, friend! Sometimes my imagination doth run away with me!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_03.Text:
*: ♪ Ohhh, the hero did slay the most foul Archfiend...
And with that, the curse broke that had stayed love's young dreeeam! ♪

*: ♪ Once again, they do stand on the tranquil quayside...
And exchange words of romance, blissful and doe-eeeyed! ♪
*: But wherefore do the monsters still roam the land, friend? I fear our troubles are not yet ended...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420_01.Text: Ooo, my darling Sabrina... Meu amor... My one true love... We are doomed never to speak again... Never to meet...
Have you seen her, <IfGender_LEADER(amigo,amiga,amigo)>? Have you seen my Sabrina?
Then please, you must tell her... Tell her that her Carlos, he still loves her, and he will for all time!
That is a shame... I wonder how she fares... Ahh, meu amor... (sigh)

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_02.Text: Oh, to see my beloved's face once more is such joy! Meu amor!
And they say it is all your doing. Thank you, friend. Obrigado. From the bottom of my heart.
I was once very proud of my skills with the sword, and set out to challenge monsters and prove my prowess.
But fight as I might, I could not get near the Archfiend, and only succeeded in embroiling my beloved in my vendetta.
What manner of warrior cannot even protect the woman he loves?
You are a true hero. I know now what the word means. It is a title of which I am not worthy. You have my utmost respect.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_01.Text: *: Ah? You require a boat? Then you must speak with the king, not me. Vaza! Leave me alone!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_02.Text: *: Ah? You have acquired a boat? I am very happy for you. Now, vaza! Leave me in peace!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_03.Text: *: Ah? You have obtained the ultimate key, and can now open any door you choose?
*: I am delighted for you. Now leave me alone! Vaza!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_04.Text: *: Ah? You have brought about the rebirth of the Everbird, Ramia?
*: I am delighted for you. Now leave me alone! Vaza!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_05.Text: *: Ah? You defeated the Archfiend Baramos? Caramba, if this is true, it is a great thing indeed! You have my thanks, stranger.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_01.Text: *: The king of our country is fond of the fiery flavour of black pepper. There are countries to the south-east where it can be purchased most cheaply.
*: But, there is none crazy enough to undertake such a journey merely for spices, surely?
*: Caramba! You have returned from the East with black pepper? Truly?
*: Tsk! Why would you tell such a lie?
*: Then you must take it to the king immediately! He will be most pleased with you!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_02.Text: *: Even fiercer monsters than those found in this region lie in wait, many in number, across the oceans.
*: Before you set out for the farthest reaches of the seas, perhaps it is better to begin with a visit to the lighthouse south of this place.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_03.Text: *: The king of our country is fond of the fiery flavour of black pepper.
*: Recently, trade routes have been established with the far-flung countries of the East, where it is grown.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_01.Text: *: With a boat at your command, you could sail the world, and procure many exotic cargoes. Ooo, just imagine...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_02.Text: *: Is it true that the mighty vessel moored in the harbour belongs to you? Wow! I'm green with envy...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820_01.Text: *: I am sorry, but His Royal Majesty has retired for the evening.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_01.Text: *: Please, if you could return tomorrow.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_01.Text: Ohhh, Carlos, my Carlos! To be able to see you again is... It is a miracle! Obrigada, traveller! Thank you. Thank you!
Caramba! I am forgetting myself. I wish to give you this. It is known as the siren sword.
It has been passed down through my family for many generations.
I am sure it will serve you handsomely on your quest.
Now please, you must excuse me. I wish to speak with my love, my Carlos, some more. Adeus for now, traveller.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_01.Text: *: This is your ship, but be careful out there. The ocean is home to many hostile creatures.
*: Instead of sailing where your heart takes you, I suggest you first head to the lighthouse south of here.
*: It is a place where many travellers gather. You might be able to learn something of use there.
*: This is your ship, but be careful out there. The ocean is home to many hostile creatures.
*: Instead of sailing where your heart takes you, I suggest you first head to the lighthouse south of here.
*: It is a place where many travellers gather. You might be able to learn something of use there.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1210_0.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1310_01.Text: *: You 'eard 'bout this geezer on the western continent that wants to make a town o' 'is own? Mad stuff...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1310_02.Text: *: Sounds like that geezer on the western continent only went ahead and built the bleedin' town, after all! Fingers crossed for 'im that people actually decide to move there...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1410_01.Text: *: You speak of the settlement by the coast, yes?
*: Ai, I cannot imagine ever wanting to live there.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1410_02.Text: *: Actually, I have heard some are already starting their lives there. I do not find myself tempted, though...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_01.Text: *: A single grain of pepper is as a single grain of pure gold.
*: We have nothing so valuable here. Still, to business. Ahem...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_01.Text: *: Ooo, to taste the fiery magic of black pepper just once before I die... This would be to have lived indeed...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_02.Text: *: Last night, His Majesty came to me secretly and made me a gift of precious black pepper.
*: But it is too precious to try. Ai, I know not what to do with it!

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_03.Text: *: (sigh) Though I was born in a town of ships, I have never once stepped aboard one...
*: I fear that simple townsfolk such as myself would not fare well on a voyage beset by monsters and other dangers of the ocean.
*: But one day, I should like to try it, just to see... Ahh, o mar... The sea... Such romance...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0620_01.Text: *: Zzz... Zzz... Ah! Monsters! Grr! Hah! Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_01.Text: *: My grandma once told me there was a special spot north-west of Portoga.
*: What could be hidden in this special spot to the north-west, I wonder... My grandma never revealed it to me.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Room01_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: Olá. I am Sabrina. (sigh) I was just daydreaming of my beloved...
The nights...they are so long...so dark...so lonely, without my dear Carlos...
Olá. I am Sabrina. (sigh) I was just wondering how long now I have spent daydreaming of my beloved...
And how soon it will be before I forget his handsome face altogether...
And the nights... Ohhh, they are so long... So lonely, without my dear Carlos...
*: (sigh) I just cannot seem to sleep of late...
*: Perhaps it is because the cat in the room next to this one cries so mournfully... <6>Meowrzzz...<9> So sad...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Room02_B1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: Bem-vindo, child of the Deusa. Stay awhile, if you please, and I will tell you a tale... There once was a brave soldier, and a beautiful young maiden.
*: The two of them, they would stare out to sea and dream of a world at peace.
*: But seeing this, the Archfiend Baramos was angered, and placed a curse upon the young lovers.
*: Ooo, truly, their tale is one of tragedy...
*: I have, as you might say, retired from life. I wished to sever the ties of sadness and desire which bound me to the world.
*: But try as I might, I could not fail to be affected by the tragic tale of the two lovers rent asunder by fate.
*: You have done a truly great thing, wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>. You have put not only their hearts, but mine also at peace.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Castle_1F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_.Text: It is said that in the lands of the East, much pepper grows.
Journey there, adventurer, and bring me news of what you find.
If you bring back precious pepper, I will honour you as a hero, and present to you my very own flagship as your prize.
Show this letter to the dwarf Nordy, who dwells in the tunnel leading eastward. He will grant you passage.
{LEADER} receives the royal missive!
You are the second person for whom I have written such a missive. The first, if memory serves, was a warrior from Aliahan...
When I inquired as to why he needed such a letter, he refused to say. All he would share was that his journey was one of the highest import.
Normally I would have had him thrown out for such impudence, but his determination struck a chord deep within me.
I knew, right then and there, that he was telling the truth. Who would I have been to stand in his way?
Ai, but I digress; that is all in the past.
Go now. And may the Goddess Herself bless your voyage! Show the letter to the dwarf Nordy and he will grant you passage.
Well, if it is not you, whom I charged to travel to the East, and return with precious pepper.
So? I take it you failed in your mission?
...Caramba! It seems not!
Ahh, precious, piquant, pitch-black pepper! The greatest treasure of the East!
You have done well. Very well indeed. I do not doubt that your journey was fraught with danger at every turn.
Such bravery is of a kind possessed only by true heroes.
Let it not be said that I am not a man of my word. The ship is yours.
Or it will be come tomorrow. First, we need to throw a banquet in your honour!
Servants, the pepper is here at last. You know what to do!
The king of Portoga was beyond pleased with his perfect, piquant pepper.
Those lucky enough to find themselves within the castle walls that night were treated to dish after dish of peppered gastronomic delights.
Then, a short while later...
Beautiful morning, eh? Makes a man want to set sail and never look back!
Tell me, did your new vessel appear in your dreams last night?
Well, rest assured she is in peak condition. You will be able to leave port right away should you wish.
But look after yourself, now.
Word has reached me of late that all is not well across the waters in Jipang and Manoza. I fear something is afoot in our realm...
Be sure to travel with caution. If you are not sure which vessel is yours, speak with the soldier in the port. He ought to be of help.
Hm? What is it?
Show this letter to the dwarf Nordy, who dwells in the tunnel leading eastward, near Asham. He will grant you passage.
Now, go forth, {LEADER}. I look forward to sampling the precious pepper you bring back!
Hm? What is it?
I hear that in Baharata, a town situated next to a river in the east, piquant pepper practically grows on trees!
Now, go forth, {LEADER}. I look forward to sampling the precious pepper you bring back!
Hm? What is it?
What? You found a merchant dealing in pepper, but he is not trading right now, so you return empty-handed? Ai!
Hmm, I'm sure the man must have his reasons... Is there nothing you can do to enable him to sell his wares once more?
Now, go forth, {LEADER}. I look forward to sampling the precious pepper you bring back!
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Are you familiar with the lighthouse close to the coast on the land-mass south of Portoga?
It is a popular stop for seafaring travellers. You never know, you might hear something of use if you choose to call in there.
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Have you heard of the kingdom of Jipang? It is an island minúsculo, even further east than Baharata.
A few years ago, rumours spread of a monstro terrível there. One with a taste for youthful flesh...
And if that were not awful enough, word has it the beast demands only girls as sacrifices! Ai, the very thought of it...
I can only hope it is just a bedtime story to scare the mischief out of the children...
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
If you ever find yourselves in the lands south of Portoga, I recommend you visit the village of Theddon.
It is a small settlement found near a forking river. Though, for some reason, we have not received visitors from there in several years...
In the past, many merchants would include it in their trade routes. Now, it may not be the hub of commerce it once was, but I'm sure you will be able to rest and relax there.
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Have you ever sailed south from Baharata? Should you ever be inclined to do so, you might meet an island home to a town named Lanson.
Word has it that a marvellous method to make oneself invisible can be found there!
All manner of shenanigans would be possible with such a thing... If it even exists, that is!
Why, I happen to know the king of Romaria would kill for such an ability. He could leave the castle whenever he pleased! In fact, I too would not mind taking a rest once in a while...
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Are you familiar with the kingdom of Edina? It lies to the north-west our nation.
It is an affluent place and blessed with all manner of rare commodities, yet I can't say I recommend you visit.
They regard all outsiders as radish-raising bumpkins. I imagine it would be an experience most unpleasant for you.
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Have you ever sailed south from Baharata? Should you ever be inclined to do so, you might meet an island home to a town named Lanson.
As it happens, I recently heard the shrine near the village houses a treasure that is beyond brilliant.
Fascinating, no? A remote little vila it may be, but it seems to have myriad attractions! Ai, I hope to make a voyage there someday...
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Have you heard of Manoza, the kingdom on the continent to the south-west? Its king is truly a man most admirável!
...Well, he used to be, at least. It's been a while now since I last heard tidings of him that weren't worrisome...
Should you happen to find yourself in Manoza, do take care.
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
You know, I can hardly believe that two great lands<--->Jipang and Manoza<--->were taken over by such fiends!
But the terror does not end there. The sailors in port speak in hushed tones of a ghost ship; they say she is doomed to wander the seas for all eternity.
Apparently, it was last sighted to the south-east of Romaria. May the Goddess preserve us!
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
I've been thinking lately that there are two things that will ruin any voyage: monsters and pirates. Though, I'm sure you could handle both with few problems, my <IfGender_LEADER(amigo,amiga,)>.
Regardless, this had been on my mind as I sometimes hear of vessels having their cargo plundered near the continent that is south-west of Portoga.
Ai, the pirates' lair must be somewhere in the area. Keep your wits about you if you plan to sail those waters.
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Have you heard that someone is attempting to found a new town on the continent to the west? It sounds like the area is sparsely populated and extremely remoto.
Perhaps if they had a deft merchant on hand, the process could be made much smoother... Why don't you go and have a look yourself? I would love to hear how their work is progressing!
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
It seems that a new town has been founded on the continent to the west of us. Alas, there isn't much there at the momento.
But they say the merchant in charge of the place is extremely resourceful. Maybe you should pay them a visit if you have the time.
Ai, precious pepper, with its most irresistible aroma... Truly, I cannot thank you enough for bringing it to me. But we cannot dwell on such delights forever...
Reports claim that the new town on the continent to the west has grown greatly!
Ai, they have even been purchasing all manner of rare jewels. Curioso that a town could experience such rapid growth, no?
What's more, it has the most peculiar name too... {MERCHANT}burg, I believe. Given time, it could become a trading port to rival even our belo Portoga.
Black pepper has a most irresistible fragrance, but woe be to he who accidentally inhales it... (sniff)
Ai, but I forgot to tell you<--->the dwarf, Nordy, he was enquiring after you. He wishes to know if you are well.
Do not look so surprised. He may appear curmudgeonly, but he is a kindly soul. Do drop by and see him if you are so inclined.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: The king is a man of his word, of that I assure you.
If you can bring him black pepper from the eastern lands, he will certainly reward you with a vessel to sail the seas!
Portoga is a bustling hub of trade, where boats from all over make port. This allows a myriad of tidings to reach the king's ears.
If you ever find yourself at a loss, I heartily recommend talking to His Majesty.
Well met! How goes your journey?
I am pleased beyond measure that our vessel continues to serve you well.
*: I am the man who tells only verdades<--->truths. Do you wish to hear one?

*: A mentiroso, boa mémoria!
A liar, he should have a good memory! Ehehehehe!
*: You do not? That is a great shame.
*: All anybody speaks of these days is exploring the lands of the East. But I find such an idea terrifying.
*: After all, are the people there not savages and barbarians?
*: The travelling merchant, he tells me of a river in the East whose waters are capable of restoring youth and beauty.
*: Ooo, how I long to go there and see such a wonder for myself!
*: In the lands of the East, there is a great shrine where pilgrims from across the world travel to alter their vocations.
*: Ai, if I could only visit such a place...
*: On the orders of His Majesty, I have established a trade in black pepper between Portoga and Baharata.
*: Ooo, but the monsters out there are terrifying, and it takes what feels like aeons to traverse the trade route...
*: But I cannot shake my love of travel, of discovery, so I still make the trip day after day! I am a wild and reckless adventurer at heart! Heh heh.
*: Many have tried to journey to the East, but have died in so doing, Goddess rest their souls. Take care, wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>.
*: You are a true hero, friend! I admire you greatly!
*: His Majesty's love of pepper...it is too much!
*: Though our kingdom may be small, our king is truly a great man. Please, you must show respect in his presence.
*: Olá! Welcome in the castelo of Portoga.

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Castle_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_1.Text: If you possess <DefSgl_I_NAME> then you ought to be able to open all the world's doors.
Why, you could likely enter all the treasure rooms of the realm's castles too...
Ah, but forget I said anything. I was just thinking aloud. Ai, what I would not do to obtain such a key myself...

Txt_Talk_Portoga_Castle_DreamSpace_MAIN_.Text: The next step of your journey awaits. The seas beckon.
Though they are fraught with danger, and crossing them will be no mean feat.
However, it is a task you must undertake if you are to gather the orbs scattered across the realm.
Scour the world and lend a hand to those in need, whilst denying those who would do wrong.
Follow this path most righteous, and you shall find the orbs before long.
Now, rest. Much awaits you in the morning...
